entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING ENDED, La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:59 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maniwaki Airport 11:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -11.8°C
Wind: N 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Clearing early this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill minus 24 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing. Low minus 24. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
